name: Sacred Geometry #40
description: A mesmerizing exploration of sacred geometry featuring the Flower of Life pattern, Metatron's Cube, and golden ratio spiral on a dark starry background. Intricate geometric patterns form a harmonious and balanced composition with delicate connecting lines, energy points, and symbolic elements at cardinal points. The design includes hexagons, star hexagrams, and Sanskrit-inspired symbols that reference ancient wisdom traditions, all rendered in a palette of blues, purples, and accents of gold.
